subject: Flags, Emblems and Insignia
Automobile Racing
Civil War (US) (1861-65)
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Nascar, so closely associated with its Southern roots, continues to struggle in trying to broaden its appeal nationally without alienating its base.
snippet: Nascar, so closely associated with its Southern roots, continues to struggle in trying to broaden its appeal nationally without alienating its base.
